NL Question: For each type of place, calculate the average number of visits performed by people with 'Sick' health status and the average number of visits performed by people with 'Healthy' health status. Return the place type, average visits by 'Sick' people, and average visits by 'Healthy' people.
Cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:PERFORMS_VISIT]->(v:Visit)-[:LOCATED_AT]->(pl:Place)
WITH pl.type AS placeType, p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, COUNT(v) AS visitCount
WITH placeType, healthStatus, AVG(visitCount) AS avgVisitCount
WITH placeType, COLLECT({healthStatus: healthStatus, avgVisitCount: avgVisitCount}) AS healthStatusData
RETURN placeType, 
       [data IN healthStatusData WHERE data.healthStatus = 'Sick' | data.avgVisitCount][0] AS avgVisitsBySick, 
       [data IN healthStatusData WHERE data.healthStatus = 'Healthy' | data.avgVisitCount][0] AS avgVisitsByHealthy
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason:
❌ Value 'healthStatus' for property 'healthStatus' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgVisitCount' for property 'avgVisitCount' not found in the NL question.
value_validation:
❌ Value 'healthStatus' for property 'healthStatus' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgVisitCount' for property 'avgVisitCount' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each country, find the place type with the highest average visit duration (in seconds). Return the country name, the place type with the highest average duration, and that average duration.
Cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place)
MATCH (pl)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Country)
WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL
WITH c.name AS country, pl.type AS placeType, AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDuration
WITH country, COLLECT({type: placeType, duration: avgDuration}) AS placeDurations
WITH country, REDUCE(maxDuration = {type: '', duration: 0}, pd IN placeDurations |
  CASE WHEN pd.duration > maxDuration.duration THEN pd ELSE maxDuration END
) AS maxDurationPlace
RETURN country, maxDurationPlace.type AS placeType, maxDurationPlace.duration AS avgDuration
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason:
❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgDuration' for property 'duration' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value '0' for property 'duration' not found in the NL question.
value_validation:
❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgDuration' for property 'duration' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value '0' for property 'duration' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each type of place, calculate the average visit duration in seconds and the number of people with 'Sick' health status who visited those places. Return the place type, average duration, and the count of 'Sick' visitors.
Cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:VISITS]->(pl:Place)
WHERE p.healthstatus = 'Sick'
WITH pl.type AS placeType, p
MATCH (p)-[:PERFORMS_VISIT]->(v:Visit)-[:LOCATED_AT]->(pl2:Place {type: placeType})
WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL
WITH placeType, AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDuration, COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS sickVisitorCount
RETURN placeType, avgDuration, sickVisitorCount
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each country, compute the ratio of the average visit duration in seconds for 'Sick' persons to the average visit duration for 'Healthy' persons. Return the country name and the visit duration ratio.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place) MATCH (pl)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Country) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH c.name AS country, p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, v.duration.seconds AS visitDuration WITH country, healthStatus, AVG(visitDuration) AS avgDuration WHERE healthStatus IN ['Sick', 'Healthy'] WITH country, COLLECT({healthStatus: healthStatus, avgDuration: avgDuration}) AS healthData WITH country, healthData[0].avgDuration AS sickDuration, healthData[1].avgDuration AS healthyDuration RETURN country, sickDuration / healthyDuration
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason:
❌ Value 'healthStatus' for property 'healthStatus' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgDuration' for property 'avgDuration' not found in the NL question.
value_validation:
❌ Value 'healthStatus' for property 'healthStatus' not found in the NL question.
❌ Value 'avgDuration' for property 'avgDuration' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each type of place, calculate the average visit duration (in seconds) made by 'Sick' persons and the average visit duration made by 'Healthy' persons. Return the place type, the average duration for 'Sick' persons, and the average duration for 'Healthy' persons.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH pl.type AS placeType, p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, v.duration.seconds AS visitDuration WITH placeType, healthStatus, AVG(visitDuration) AS avgDuration WITH placeType, COLLECT({healthStatus: healthStatus, avgDuration: avgDuration}) AS durations UNWIND durations AS duration RETURN placeType, duration.healthStatus, duration.avgDuration

NL Question: For each person's health status, determine the average number of visits made to each type of place and the average duration of those visits in seconds. Return the health status, place type, average number of visits, and average visit duration.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, pl.type AS placeType, v.duration.seconds AS duration MATCH (p)-[v2:VISITS]->(pl2:Place {type:placeType}) WITH healthStatus, placeType, duration, COUNT(v2) AS visitCount RETURN healthStatus, placeType, AVG(visitCount) AS avgVisitCount, AVG(duration) AS avgDuration

value_validation: ❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each country, determine the percentage of visits that have a duration longer than the average visit duration across all visits in the dataset. Return the country name and the percentage of longer visits.
Cypher: MATCH (v:Visit) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDuration MATCH (p:Person)-[vi:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Country) WHERE vi.duration.seconds > avgDuration WITH c.name AS countryName, COUNT(vi) AS longerVisits MATCH (p:Person)-[v2:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Country {name:countryName}) WITH countryName, longerVisits, COUNT(v2) AS totalVisits RETURN countryName, toFloat(longerVisits) / totalVisits * 100 AS percentageLongerVisits
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'countryName' for property 'name' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'countryName' for property 'name' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each region, find the top 2 place types with the highest average visit duration (in seconds). Return the region name, place type, and average visit duration.
Cypher: MATCH (v:Visit)-[:LOCATED_AT]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(r:Region) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH r.name AS regionName, pl.type AS placeType, AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDuration ORDER BY avgDuration DESC WITH regionName, COLLECT({placeType: placeType, avgDuration: avgDuration}) AS placeDurations UNWIND HEAD(placeDurations) AS topPlace WITH regionName, topPlace.placeType AS placeType, topPlace.avgDuration AS avgDuration RETURN regionName, placeType, avgDuration LIMIT 2
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason:

❌ Value 'avgDuration' for property 'avgDuration' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each continent, find the place type with the longest average visit duration (in seconds). Return the continent name, place type, and average duration.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place) MATCH (pl)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(:Country)-[:PART_OF]->(cont:Continent) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH cont.name AS continent, pl.type AS placeType, AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDuration ORDER BY avgDuration DESC WITH continent, placeType, avgDuration, COLLECT({type:placeType, duration:avgDuration}) AS durationsPerContinent RETURN continent, head(durationsPerContinent).type AS placeTypeWithLongestAvgDuration, head(durationsPerContinent).duration AS longestAvgDuration

NL Question: For each type of place, calculate the average duration (in seconds) of visits made by people with 'Healthy' status and the average duration of visits made by people with 'Sick' status. Return the place type, average duration for 'Healthy' visitors, and average duration for 'Sick' visitors.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place) WHERE v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH pl.type AS placeType, p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, v.duration.seconds AS duration WHERE healthStatus IN ['Healthy', 'Sick'] WITH placeType, healthStatus, AVG(duration) AS avgDuration ORDER BY placeType, healthStatus WITH placeType, COLLECT({healthStatus: healthStatus, avgDuration: avgDuration}) AS durations RETURN placeType, durations[0].avgDuration AS healthyAvgDuration, durations[1].avgDuration AS sickAvgDuration

NL Question: For each continent, calculate the average duration (in seconds) of visits to 'Restaurant' and 'Park' locations, and then return the continent name, average duration for 'Restaurant' visits, and average duration for 'Park' visits.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(:Country)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Continent) WHERE pl.type IN ['Restaurant', 'Park'] AND v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH c.name AS continent, pl.type AS placeType, v.duration.seconds AS duration WITH continent, COLLECT({type: placeType, duration: duration}) AS placeDurations RETURN continent, AVG([d IN placeDurations WHERE d.type = 'Restaurant' | d.duration][0]) AS avgRestaurantDuration, AVG([d IN placeDurations WHERE d.type = 'Park' | d.duration][0]) AS avgParkDuration
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'placeType' for property 'type' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each region, calculate the average number of visits performed by each person and the total number of persons who performed more than the average number of visits. Return the region name and the count of persons with above-average visits.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(r:Region) WITH r.name AS region, p, COUNT(pl) AS visitCount WITH region, AVG(visitCount) AS avgVisits, COLLECT({person: p, visits: visitCount}) AS personVisits UNWIND personVisits AS pv WITH region, avgVisits, pv WHERE pv.visits > avgVisits RETURN region, COUNT(pv.person) AS aboveAverageVisitorCount
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!
failure_reason: ❌ Value 'visitCount' for property 'visits' not found in the NL question.
value_validation: ❌ Value 'visitCount' for property 'visits' not found in the NL question.

NL Question: For each region, find the average visit duration for 'Grocery shop' places and 'Restaurant' places separately. Return the region name, average duration for 'Grocery shop' visits, and average duration for 'Restaurant' visits in seconds.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[v:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(r:Region) WHERE pl.type IN ['Grocery shop', 'Restaurant'] AND v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL WITH r.name AS region, pl.type AS placeType, AVG(v.duration.seconds) AS avgDurationPerVisit WITH region, COLLECT({placeType: placeType, avgDuration: avgDurationPerVisit}) AS placeDurations UNWIND placeDurations AS pd WITH region, pd.placeType AS placeType, pd.avgDuration AS avgDuration RETURN region, MAX(CASE WHEN placeType = 'Grocery shop' THEN avgDuration ELSE null END) AS avgGroceryShopDuration, MAX(CASE WHEN placeType = 'Restaurant' THEN avgDuration ELSE null END) AS avgRestaurantDuration
schema_validation: ✅ Query is valid according to schema!

value_validation:

NL Question: For each continent, calculate the average number of visits performed by persons with 'Healthy' and 'Sick' health statuses separately. Return the continent name, average number of visits for 'Healthy' persons, and average number of visits for 'Sick' persons.
Cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[:VISITS]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(:Country)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Continent) WITH c.name AS continent, p.healthstatus AS healthStatus, p WITH continent, healthStatus, COUNT(*) AS visitCount WITH continent, COLLECT({healthStatus: healthStatus, visitCount: visitCount}) AS healthVisitCounts UNWIND healthVisitCounts AS hvc WITH continent, hvc.healthStatus AS healthStatus, hvc.visitCount AS visitCount RETURN continent, MAX(CASE WHEN healthStatus = 'Healthy' THEN visitCount ELSE null END) AS avgHealthyVisits, MAX(CASE WHEN healthStatus = 'Sick' THEN visitCount ELSE null END) AS avgSickVisits

NL Question: For each continent, calculate the average number of visits made by 'Sick' persons to 'Theater' places. Return the continent name and the average number of visits.
